description.displayText: I recently used Betania's services as a (short-term) live-in nanny and housekeeper, and I highly recommend her! I had to travel for about a week for work, and Betania took special care of my 2-year old and 6-year-old children. She also helped out my elderly mom around the house. Everything went smoothly! My kids loved her, and the house was well-maintained! Very responsible and sweet! I would definitely use her again! Recommended!
